page.title: 18LOCAL TRAVEL
page.content: The local bus company is the Ribble. There are 12 hourly service buses to Carlisle on week days and 11 on Saturdays.On Sundays and Bank Holidays there are only 2 going there. There are 11 buses to Penrith on weekdays at hourly intervals,but on Mondays,Wednesdays and Fridays there is an extra bus.On Sundays and Bank Holidays there are only 2 buses. Of the 12 families in our Survey,out of 25 adults interviewed 6 use public transport,4 families own 2 cars or more and 6 families have 1 car. Overseas Countries visited by interviewees include Belgium,Japan,New Zealand,Germany,Jersey,Switzerland, Libya,Ireland,Norway,Turkey,Holland, France,U.S.A.9 people have never been outside the U.K.
